alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 1:21PM AKST until January 21 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Winds gusting to 40 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow with visibility one half mile or less at times. Wind chills to 40 below expected. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 PM Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 40 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Cold wind chills to 40 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. Large snow drifts will form. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.
